tileData.text: Let's get started; could you share your first name with me?
Hello there! I'm Maggie, your virtual guide, here to enhance your shopping experience.

Hello! I'm Maggie, your virtual assistant.

Our team is available during the following hours:

Monday to Friday: 9 am to 10 pm Eastern Time
Saturday and Sunday: 12 pm to 9 pm Eastern Time
During our off-hours, I can collect some information from you, and I'll make sure to pass it along to our team as soon as they're back online.
Thanks! I'll pass this along. Someone will reach out as soon as they're available.
Great, let me gather some details from you to streamline the process, and then I'll connect you with the right person.
I apologize, I'm unable to comprehend.

Hmm, that doesn't look quite right. I'm looking for just your last name.

Let's try that again. Can I get your last name?
How may I be of service?

Hmm, that doesn't look quite right. I'm looking for just your first name.

Let's try that again. Can I get your name?

conversationMessage.name: text_question_22

tileData.text: Tell me the name of the movie to get information.
Got it. In a few words, can you summarize what you're reaching out about?

conversationMessage.name: Check_Agent
dialog_starter

tileData.text: Certainly! When our customer service team is back online, I'll ensure you can chat with an agent.

There should be an '@', followed by a domain (name@email.com).

Was the email address you used to place the order?

Perfect. What's a good email to reach you at if we need to follow up with? 

No spam, we promise!
